metadata.title: Murphy Ben International | Africa's Leading Digital Media & Entertainment Company
metadata.description: MBI is the digital powerhouse behind Aforevo, Vybz FM, and the continent's largest YouTube network. We monetize, distribute, and protect African content globally.

hero.heading: AFRICA'S DIGITAL MEDIA POWERHOUSE
hero.subheading: We are the engine behind the continent's most watched content. From Nollywood blockbusters to Afrobeatz radio, MBI connects African creativity to the global economy.

items.title: Aforevo Cinema
items.description: The undisputed giant of Nollywood streaming. Curating, dubbing, and distributing thousands of hours of premium African movies to the diaspora.

items.title: MBI Music
items.description: Amplifying the rhythm of the continent. From Afrobeatz radio to global DSP distribution, we monetize the sound of Africa.

items.title: MBI Tech
items.description: Proprietary DRM and anti-piracy infrastructure protecting the intellectual property of African creators.
